segments.text: There ’ s a big sale on clothes and sporting goods at Riverside Mall .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sporting goods ? Is that bike Tim wanted on sale ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it ’ s 30 percent off the regular price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , maybe we could get it now and hide it until his birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it ’ s a couple weeks away , and we don ’ t have anything yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t buy him underwear again . He hates that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , I know , but if I didn ’ t buy it for him , he ’ d never buy it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See anything else we need there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , all shoes are 20 percent off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shoes ? You already have a closet full of shoes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but another pair can ’ t hurt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , all right . I need some new shirts , too . Let ’ s go after breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2
